English: (Tw) (of the police) to bury a crime (i.e. conceal the existence of a criminal case in order to improve crime-solving statistics or in return for a bribe etc)

e: `如~：「`上級~`三令五申~`基層~`警員~`要~`據實~`呈報~，`不可~`吃案~。」
d.f: `指~`警察~`暗地~`裡~`壓~`下~`案件~`而~`不~`向上~`呈報~。

English: (Tw) (of the police) to bury a crime (i.e. conceal the existence of a criminal case in order to improve crime-solving statistics or in return for a bribe etc)
